page.title: 13Colney Heath:History &Nature
page.content: Colney heath was away from towns and cities. They had{boxing, cockfighting, { and card sharping}on the heath.Cattle were allowed to graze there until the 1920's. Colney heath is well known for its variety of plantlife. On the heath there are 5 habitats. These are{wet {heath,river,woodland,grassland}and{ {acid heath.}On the{acid heath }we found{vetch, hogweed}and{creeping {buttercup.}In the{woodland} we found{ {elder,may}and{oak trees.}The{ {wet heath}wasn't as boggy as usual.We found these plants:{meadow {buttercup,soft rush, cuckoo spit }and {lesser spearwort.} By the{river}we saw {willowrush, bulrush }and{alder.}On {grassland}we found{eggs and bacon, {lesser trefoil and cow parsley.
